title: Checklist-based Online Science Lecture Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Enhancing the ability to design science lectures optimized for blended (online-offline) classes using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify over 80% of the core elements of science lectures using the OCDC (Online Course Design Checklist).
Learners can develop three or more blended (online-offline) activities based on checklist-driven design.
Learners can analyze quality indicators of designed science lectures with 90% accuracy through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
